title: AI/ML/DL and Chatbot Developer
about_me: Lead AI & ML Developer at The Other Fruit with 5+ years of freelance experience in API development with Python+Flask and NodeJS+Express, AI/ML/DL project development in the field of Image classification, Object detection, Natural Language Processing, search engine development using Elastic, chat-bot development on Google Dialogflow ES/CX, part-time Youtuber.
